00039 #include <stdio.h>
00040 #include <math.h>
00041 #include "mscb.h"
00042 
00043 extern bit FREEZE_MODE;
00044 extern bit DEBUG_MODE;
00045 
00046 char code node_name[] = "HVR-200";
00047 
00048 /* number of HV channels */
00049 #define N_HV_CHN 4   
00050 
00051 /* declare number of sub-addresses to framework */
00052 unsigned char idata _n_sub_addr = N_HV_CHN;
00053 
00054 /* calculate voltage divider */
00055 #define DIVIDER ((41E6 + 33E3) / 33E3)
00056 
00057 /* current resistor */
00058 #define RCURR 56E3
00059 
00060 /* current multiplier */
00061 #define CUR_MULT 15
00062 
00063 /* delay for opto-couplers in us */
00064 #define OPT_DELAY 100
00065 
00066 /* configuration jumper */
00067 sbit JU0 = P3 ^ 4;              // negative module if forced to zero
00068 sbit JU1 = P3 ^ 2;
00069 sbit JU2 = P3 ^ 1;
00070 
00071 sbit SET_ADDR = P3 ^ 3;         // push button
00072 
00073 /* AD7718 pins */
00074 sbit ADC_NRES = P1 ^ 7;         // !Reset
00075 sbit ADC_SCLK = P1 ^ 5;         // Serial Clock
00076 sbit ADC_NCS  = P1 ^ 3;         // !Chip select
00077 sbit ADC_NRDY = P1 ^ 0;         // !Ready
00078 sbit ADC_DOUT = P1 ^ 1;         // Data out
00079 sbit ADC_DIN  = P1 ^ 4;         // Data in
00080 
00081 /* LTC2600 pins */
00082 sbit DAC_NCS  = P1 ^ 2;         // !Chip select
00083 sbit DAC_SCK  = P1 ^ 5;         // Serial Clock
00084 sbit DAC_CLR  = P1 ^ 6;         // Clear
00085 sbit DAC_DIN  = P1 ^ 4;         // Data in
00086 
00087 /* AD7718 registers */
00088 #define REG_STATUS     0
00089 #define REG_MODE       1
00090 #define REG_CONTROL    2
00091 #define REG_FILTER     3
00092 #define REG_ADCDATA    4
00093 #define REG_ADCOFFSET  5
00094 #define REG_ADCGAIN    6
00095 #define REG_IOCONTROL  7
00096 
00097 #define ADC_SF_VALUE  82        // SF value for 50Hz rejection
00098 
00099 unsigned char idata chn_bits[N_HV_CHN];
00100 #define DEMAND_CHANGED     (1<<0)
00101 #define RAMP_UP            (1<<1)
00102 #define RAMP_DOWN          (1<<2)
00103 #define CUR_LIMIT_CHANGED  (1<<3)
00104 
00105 float xdata v_actual[N_HV_CHN];
00106 
00107 /*---- Define variable parameters returned to CMD_GET_INFO command ----*/
00108 
00109 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00110 
00111 /* CSR control bits */
00112 #define CONTROL_HV_ON      (1<<0)
00113 #define CONTROL_REGULATION (1<<1)
00114 #define CONTROL_IDLE       (1<<2)
00115 
00116 /* CSR status bits */
00117 #define STATUS_NEGATIVE    (1<<0)
00118 #define STATUS_LOWCUR      (1<<1)
00119 #define STATUS_RAMP_UP     (1<<2)
00120 #define STATUS_RAMP_DOWN   (1<<3)
00121 #define STATUS_VLIMIT      (1<<4)
00122 #define STATUS_ILIMIT      (1<<5)
00123 
00124 struct {
00125    unsigned char control;
00126    float v_demand;
00127    float v_meas;
00128    float i_meas;
00129    unsigned char status;
00130    unsigned char trip_cnt;
00131 
00132    unsigned int ramp_up;
00133    unsigned int ramp_down;
00134    float v_limit;
00135    float i_limit;
00136    unsigned char trip_max;
00137 
00138    float adc_gain;
00139    float adc_offset;
00140    float dac_gain;
00141    float dac_offset;
00142    float cur_gain;
00143    float cur_offset;
00144 
00145    float temperature;
00146    float v_dac;
00147 } xdata user_data[N_HV_CHN];
00148 
00149 MSCB_INFO_VAR code variables[] = {
00150 
00151    1, UNIT_BYTE,            0, 0,           0, "Control", &user_data[0].control,     // 0
00152    4, UNIT_VOLT,            0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Vdemand", &user_data[0].v_demand,    // 1
00153    4, UNIT_VOLT,            0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Vmeas",   &user_data[0].v_meas,      // 2
00154    4, UNIT_AMPERE, PRFX_MICRO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Imeas",   &user_data[0].i_meas,      // 3
00155    1, UNIT_BYTE,            0, 0,           0, "Status",  &user_data[0].status,      // 4
00156    1, UNIT_COUNT,           0, 0,           0, "TripCnt", &user_data[0].trip_cnt,    // 5
00157 
00158    2, UNIT_VOLT,            0, 0,           0, "RampUp",  &user_data[0].ramp_up,     // 6
00159    2, UNIT_VOLT,            0, 0,           0, "RampDown",&user_data[0].ramp_down,   // 7
00160    4, UNIT_VOLT,            0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Vlimit",  &user_data[0].v_limit,     // 8 
00161    4, UNIT_AMPERE, PRFX_MICRO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Ilimit",  &user_data[0].i_limit,     // 9
00162    1, UNIT_COUNT,           0, 0,           0, "TripMax", &user_data[0].trip_max,    // 10
00163 
00164    /* calibration constants */
00165    4, UNIT_FACTOR,          0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "ADCgain", &user_data[0].adc_gain,    // 11
00166    4, UNIT_VOLT,            0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "ADCofs",  &user_data[0].adc_offset,  // 12
00167    4, UNIT_FACTOR,          0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "DACgain", &user_data[0].dac_gain,    // 13
00168    4, UNIT_VOLT,            0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "DACofs",  &user_data[0].dac_offset,  // 14
00169    4, UNIT_FACTOR,          0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "CURgain", &user_data[0].cur_gain,    // 15
00170    4, UNIT_AMPERE, PRFX_MICRO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "CURofs",  &user_data[0].cur_offset,  // 16
00171 
00172    4, UNIT_CELSIUS,         0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Temp",    &user_data[0].temperature, // 17
00173    4, UNIT_VOLT,            0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "VDAC",    &user_data[0].v_dac,       // 18
00174    0
00175 };

00188 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00189 
00190 extern SYS_INFO sys_info;
00191 
00192 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00193 {
00194    unsigned char i;
00195 
00196    P2MDOUT = 0xF0; // P2.4-7: enable Push/Pull for LEDs
00197 
00198    SET_ADDR = 1;   // use button as input
00199 
00200    /* initial nonzero EEPROM values */
00201    if (init) {
00202       for (i=0 ; i<N_HV_CHN ; i++) {
00203          user_data[i].v_demand = 0;
00204          user_data[i].trip_cnt = 0;
00205          user_data[i].ramp_up = 0;
00206          user_data[i].ramp_down = 0;
00207          user_data[i].v_limit = 3000;
00208          user_data[i].i_limit = 3000;
00209          user_data[i].trip_max = 0;
00210    
00211          user_data[i].adc_gain = 1;
00212          user_data[i].adc_offset = 0;
00213          user_data[i].dac_gain = 1;
00214          user_data[i].dac_offset = 0;
00215          user_data[i].cur_gain = 1;
00216          user_data[i].cur_offset = 0;
00217       }
00218    }
00219 
00220    /* default control register */
00221    for (i=0 ; i<N_HV_CHN ; i++) {
00222       user_data[i].control = CONTROL_REGULATION;
00223       user_data[i].status = 0;
00224       user_data[i].temperature = 0;
00225    }
00226 
00227    JU1 = 1;
00228    JU2 = 1;
00229 
00230    /* set-up DAC & ADC */
00231    DAC_CLR = 1;
00232    ADC_NRES = 1;
00233    ADC_NRDY = 1; // input
00234    ADC_DIN = 1;  // input
00235 
00236    write_adc(REG_FILTER, ADC_SF_VALUE);
00237 
00238    /* force update */
00239    for (i=0 ; i<N_HV_CHN ; i++)
00240       chn_bits[i] = DEMAND_CHANGED | CUR_LIMIT_CHANGED;
00241 
00242    /* LED normally off (non-inverted) */
00243    for (i=0 ; i<N_HV_CHN ; i++)
00244       led_mode(i, 0);
00245 }

00247 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00248 
00249 #pragma NOAREGS
00250 
00251 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00252 {
00253    if (index == 0 || index == 1 || index == 4) {
00254       /* reset trip */
00255       user_data[cur_sub_addr()].status &= ~STATUS_ILIMIT;
00256 
00257       /* indicate new demand voltage */
00258       chn_bits[cur_sub_addr()] |= DEMAND_CHANGED;
00259    }
00260 
00261    /* re-check voltage limit */
00262    if (index == 8) {
00263       chn_bits[cur_sub_addr()] |= DEMAND_CHANGED;
00264    }
00265 }
00266 
00267 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00268 
00269 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char index)
00270 {
00271    if (index);
00272    return 0;
00273 }

00275 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00276 
00277 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00278 {
00279    /* echo input data */
00280    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00281    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00282    return 2;
00283 }
00284 
00285 /*---- DAC functions -----------------------------------------------*/
00286 
00287 unsigned char code dac_index[] = {3, 2, 1, 0 };
00288 
00289 void write_dac(unsigned char channel, unsigned short value) reentrant
00290 {
00291 unsigned char i, m, b;
00292 
00293    /* do mapping */
00294    channel = dac_index[channel % 4];
00295 
00296    DAC_NCS = 0; // chip select
00297 
00298    // command 3: write and update
00299    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00300       DAC_SCK = 0;
00301       DAC_DIN = (3 & m) > 0;
00302       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00303       DAC_SCK = 1;
00304       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00305       m >>= 1;
00306    }
00307 
00308    // channel address
00309    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00310       DAC_SCK = 0;
00311       DAC_DIN = (channel & m) > 0;
00312       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00313       DAC_SCK = 1;
00314       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00315       m >>= 1;
00316    }
00317 
00318    // MSB
00319    b = value >> 8;
00320    for (i=0,m=0x80 ; i<8 ; i++) {
00321       DAC_SCK = 0;
00322       DAC_DIN = (b & m) > 0;
00323       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00324       DAC_SCK = 1;
00325       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00326       m >>= 1;
00327    }
00328 
00329    // LSB
00330    b = value & 0xFF;
00331    for (i=0,m=0x80 ; i<8 ; i++) {
00332       DAC_SCK = 0;
00333       DAC_DIN = (b & m) > 0;
00334       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00335       DAC_SCK = 1;
00336       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00337       m >>= 1;
00338    }
00339 
00340    DAC_NCS = 1; // remove chip select
00341    delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00342 }
00343 
00344 /*---- ADC functions -----------------------------------------------*/
00345 
00346 void write_adc(unsigned char a, unsigned char d)
00347 {
00348    unsigned char i, m;
00349 
00350    /* write to communication register */
00351 
00352    ADC_NCS = 0;
00353    
00354    /* write zeros to !WEN and R/!W */
00355    for (i=0 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00356       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00357       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00358       ADC_DIN  = 0;
00359       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00360       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00361       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00362    }
00363 
00364    /* register address */
00365    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00366       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00367       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00368       ADC_DIN  = (a & m) > 0;
00369       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00370       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00371       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00372       m >>= 1;
00373    }
00374 
00375    ADC_NCS = 1;
00376    delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00377 
00378    /* write to selected data register */
00379 
00380    ADC_NCS = 0;
00381 
00382    for (i=0,m=0x80 ; i<8 ; i++) {
00383       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00384       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00385       ADC_DIN  = (d & m) > 0;
00386       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00387       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00388       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00389       m >>= 1;
00390    }
00391 
00392    ADC_NCS = 1;
00393    delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00394 }
00395 
00396 void read_adc8(unsigned char a, unsigned char *d)
00397 {
00398    unsigned char i, m;
00399 
00400    /* write to communication register */
00401 
00402    ADC_NCS = 0;
00403    
00404    /* write zero to !WEN and one to R/!W */
00405    for (i=0 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00406       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00407       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00408       ADC_DIN  = (i == 1);
00409       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00410       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00411       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00412    }
00413 
00414    /* register address */
00415    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00416       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00417       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00418       ADC_DIN  = (a & m) > 0;
00419       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00420       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00421       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00422       m >>= 1;
00423    }
00424 
00425    ADC_NCS = 1;
00426    delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00427 
00428    /* read from selected data register */
00429 
00430    ADC_NCS = 0;
00431 
00432    for (i=0,m=0x80,*d=0 ; i<8 ; i++) {
00433       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00434       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00435       if (ADC_DOUT)
00436          *d |= m;
00437       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00438       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00439       m >>= 1;
00440    }
00441 
00442    ADC_NCS = 1;
00443    delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00444 }
00445 
00446 void read_adc24(unsigned char a, unsigned long *d)
00447 {
00448    unsigned char i, m;
00449 
00450    /* write to communication register */
00451 
00452    ADC_NCS = 0;
00453    
00454    /* write zero to !WEN and one to R/!W */
00455    for (i=0 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00456       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00457       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00458       ADC_DIN  = (i == 1);
00459       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00460       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00461       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00462    }
00463 
00464    /* register address */
00465    for (i=0,m=8 ; i<4 ; i++) {
00466       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00467       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00468       ADC_DIN  = (a & m) > 0;
00469       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00470       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00471       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00472       m >>= 1;
00473    }
00474 
00475    ADC_NCS = 1;
00476    delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00477 
00478    /* read from selected data register */
00479 
00480    ADC_NCS = 0;
00481 
00482    for (i=0,*d=0 ; i<24 ; i++) {
00483       *d <<= 1;
00484       ADC_SCLK = 0;
00485       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00486       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00487       *d |= ADC_DOUT;
00488       ADC_SCLK = 1;
00489       delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00490    }
00491 
00492    ADC_NCS = 1;
00493    delay_us(OPT_DELAY);
00494 }
00495 
00496 unsigned char code adc_index[8] = {7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, 0 };
00497 
00498 void adc_read(unsigned char channel, float *value)
00499 {
00500    unsigned long d, start_time;
00501    unsigned char i;
00502 
00503    /* start conversion */
00504    channel = adc_index[channel % 8];
00505    write_adc(REG_CONTROL, channel << 4 | 0x0F); // adc_chn, +2.56V range
00506    write_adc(REG_MODE, 2);                      // single conversion
00507 
00508    start_time = time();
00509 
00510    while (ADC_NRDY) {
00511       yield();
00512       for (i=0 ; i<N_HV_CHN ; i++)
00513          ramp_hv(i);      // do ramping while reading ADC
00514 
00515       /* abort if no ADC ready after 300ms */
00516       if (time() - start_time > 30) {
00517          
00518          /* reset ADC */
00519          ADC_NRES = 0;
00520          delay_ms(100);
00521          ADC_NRES = 1;
00522          delay_ms(300);
00523 
00524          write_adc(REG_FILTER, ADC_SF_VALUE);
00525 
00526          *value = 0;
00527          return;
00528       }
00529    }
00530 
00531    read_adc24(REG_ADCDATA, &d);
00532 
00533    /* convert to volts */
00534    *value = ((float)d / (1l<<24)) * 2.56;
00535 
00536    /* round result to 6 digits */
00537    *value = floor(*value*1E6+0.5)/1E6;
00538 }
00539 
00540 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00541 
00542 void set_hv(unsigned char channel, float value) reentrant
00543 {
00544    unsigned short d;
00545 
00546    /* check for limit */
00547    if (value > user_data[channel].v_limit) {
00548       value = user_data[channel].v_limit;
00549       user_data[channel].status |= STATUS_VLIMIT;
00550    } else
00551       user_data[channel].status &= ~STATUS_VLIMIT;
00552 
00553    led_mode(channel, value > 10);
00554 
00555    /* apply correction */
00556    value = value * user_data[channel].dac_gain + user_data[channel].dac_offset;
00557    if (value < 0)
00558       value = 0;
00559 
00560    /* convert HV to voltage */
00561    value = value / DIVIDER;
00562 
00563    /* convert to DAC units */
00564    d = (unsigned short) ((value / 2.5 * 65536) + 0.5);
00565 
00566    /* write dac */
00567    write_dac(channel, d);
00568 }
00569 
00570 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00571 
00572 void read_hv(unsigned char channel)
00573 {
00574    float hv;
00575 
00576    /* read voltage channel */
00577    adc_read(channel*2, &hv);
00578 
00579    /* convert to HV */
00580    hv *= DIVIDER;
00581 
00582    /* apply calibration */
00583    hv = hv * user_data[channel].adc_gain + user_data[channel].adc_offset;
00584 
00585    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00586    user_data[channel].v_meas = hv;
00587    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00588 }
00589 
00590 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00591 
00592 void set_current_limit(float value) reentrant
00593 {
00594    unsigned short d;
00595 
00596    /* convert current to voltage */
00597    value = value / DIVIDER * CUR_MULT * RCURR / 1E6;
00598 
00599    /* convert to DAC units */
00600    d = (unsigned short) ((value / 2.5 * 65536) + 0.5);
00601 
00602    /* write current dac */
00603    write_dac(7, d);
00604 }
00605 
00606 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00607 
00608 void check_current(unsigned char channel)
00609 {
00610    if (user_data[channel].i_meas > user_data[channel].i_limit) {
00611 
00612       /* zero output voltage */
00613       set_hv(channel, 0);
00614       v_actual[channel] = 0;
00615       user_data[channel].v_dac = 0;
00616 
00617       /* stop possible ramping */
00618       chn_bits[channel] &= ~DEMAND_CHANGED;
00619       chn_bits[channel] &= ~RAMP_UP;
00620       chn_bits[channel] &= ~RAMP_DOWN;
00621       user_data[channel].status &= ~(STATUS_RAMP_UP | STATUS_RAMP_DOWN);
00622 
00623       /* raise trip flag */
00624       user_data[channel].status |= STATUS_ILIMIT;
00625       user_data[channel].trip_cnt++;
00626 
00627       /* check for trip recovery */
00628       if (user_data[channel].trip_cnt < user_data[channel].trip_max) {
00629          /* clear trip */
00630          user_data[channel].status &= ~STATUS_ILIMIT;
00631 
00632          /* force ramp up */
00633          chn_bits[channel] |= DEMAND_CHANGED;
00634       }
00635    }
00636 
00637    if (user_data[channel].status & STATUS_ILIMIT)
00638       led_blink(channel, 1, 500);
00639 }
00640 
00641 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00642 
00643 void read_current(unsigned char channel)
00644 {
00645    float current;
00646 
00647    /* read current channel */
00648    adc_read(channel*2+1, &current);
00649 
00650    /* correct opamp gain, divider & curr. resist, microamp */
00651    current = current / CUR_MULT * DIVIDER / RCURR * 1E6;
00652 
00653    /* calibrate */
00654    current = current * user_data[channel].cur_gain + user_data[channel].cur_offset;
00655 
00656    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00657    user_data[channel].i_meas = current;
00658    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00659 }
00660 
00661 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00662 
00663 void ramp_hv(unsigned char channel)
00664 {
00665    static unsigned long xdata t[N_HV_CHN];
00666    unsigned char delta;
00667 
00668    /* only process ramping when HV is on and not tripped */
00669    if ((user_data[channel].control & CONTROL_HV_ON) && 
00670        !(user_data[channel].status & STATUS_ILIMIT)) {
00671 
00672       if (chn_bits[channel] & DEMAND_CHANGED) {
00673          /* start ramping */
00674 
00675          if (user_data[channel].v_demand > v_actual[channel] && 
00676              user_data[channel].ramp_up > 0) {
00677             /* ramp up */
00678             chn_bits[channel] |= RAMP_UP;
00679             chn_bits[channel] &= ~RAMP_DOWN;
00680             user_data[channel].status |= STATUS_RAMP_UP;
00681             user_data[channel].status &= ~STATUS_RAMP_DOWN;
00682             chn_bits[channel] &= ~DEMAND_CHANGED;
00683          }
00684 
00685          if (user_data[channel].v_demand < v_actual[channel] && 
00686              user_data[channel].ramp_down > 0) {
00687             /* ramp down */
00688             chn_bits[channel] &= ~RAMP_UP;
00689             chn_bits[channel] |= RAMP_DOWN;
00690             user_data[channel].status &= ~STATUS_RAMP_UP;
00691             user_data[channel].status |= STATUS_RAMP_DOWN;
00692             chn_bits[channel] &= ~DEMAND_CHANGED;
00693          }
00694 
00695          /* remember start time */
00696          t[channel] = time();
00697       }
00698 
00699       /* ramp up */
00700       if (chn_bits[channel] & RAMP_UP) {
00701          delta = time() - t[channel];
00702          if (delta) {
00703             v_actual[channel] += (float) user_data[channel].ramp_up * delta / 100.0;
00704 
00705             if (v_actual[channel] >= user_data[channel].v_demand) {
00706                /* finish ramping */
00707 
00708                v_actual[channel] = user_data[channel].v_demand;
00709                user_data[channel].v_dac = v_actual[channel];
00710                chn_bits[channel] &= ~RAMP_UP;
00711                user_data[channel].status &= ~STATUS_RAMP_UP;
00712 
00713             }
00714 
00715             set_hv(channel, v_actual[channel]);
00716             t[channel] = time();
00717          }
00718       }
00719 
00720       /* ramp down */
00721       if (chn_bits[channel] & RAMP_DOWN) {
00722          delta = time() - t[channel];
00723          if (delta) {
00724             v_actual[channel] -= (float) user_data[channel].ramp_down * delta / 100.0;
00725 
00726             if (v_actual[channel] <= user_data[channel].v_demand) {
00727                /* finish ramping */
00728 
00729                v_actual[channel] = user_data[channel].v_demand;
00730                user_data[channel].v_dac = v_actual[channel];
00731                chn_bits[channel] &= ~RAMP_DOWN;
00732                user_data[channel].status &= ~STATUS_RAMP_DOWN;
00733 
00734             }
00735 
00736             set_hv(channel, v_actual[channel]);
00737             t[channel] = time();
00738          }
00739       }
00740    }
00741 }
00742 
00743 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00744 
00745 void regulation(unsigned char channel)
00746 {
00747    /* only if HV on and not ramping */
00748    if ((user_data[channel].control & CONTROL_HV_ON) && 
00749        (chn_bits[channel] & (RAMP_UP | RAMP_DOWN)) == 0 &&
00750        !(user_data[channel].status & STATUS_ILIMIT)) {
00751       if (user_data[channel].control & CONTROL_REGULATION) {
00752 
00753          v_actual[channel] = user_data[channel].v_demand;
00754 
00755          /* correct if difference is at least half a LSB */
00756          if (fabs(user_data[channel].v_demand - user_data[channel].v_meas) / DIVIDER / 2.5 * 65536 > 0.5) {
00757    
00758             user_data[channel].v_dac += user_data[channel].v_demand - user_data[channel].v_meas;
00759    
00760             /* only allow +-2V fine regulation range */
00761             if (user_data[channel].v_dac < user_data[channel].v_demand - 2)
00762                user_data[channel].v_dac = user_data[channel].v_demand - 2;
00763    
00764             if (user_data[channel].v_dac > user_data[channel].v_demand + 2)
00765                user_data[channel].v_dac = user_data[channel].v_demand + 2;
00766    
00767             chn_bits[channel] &= ~DEMAND_CHANGED;
00768             set_hv(channel, user_data[channel].v_dac);
00769          }
00770 
00771       } else {
00772          /* set voltage directly */
00773          if (chn_bits[channel] & DEMAND_CHANGED) {
00774             v_actual[channel] = user_data[channel].v_demand;
00775             user_data[channel].v_dac = user_data[channel].v_demand;
00776             set_hv(channel, user_data[channel].v_demand);
00777 
00778             chn_bits[channel] &= ~DEMAND_CHANGED;
00779          }
00780       }
00781    }
00782 
00783    /* if HV switched off, set DAC to zero */
00784    if (!(user_data[channel].control & CONTROL_HV_ON) && 
00785        (chn_bits[channel] & DEMAND_CHANGED)) {
00786 
00787       user_data[channel].v_dac = 0;
00788       set_hv(channel, 0);
00789       chn_bits[channel] &= ~DEMAND_CHANGED;
00790    }
00791 }
00792 
00793 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00794 
00795 #ifdef NOT_RELIABLE
00796 
00797 void read_temperature(void)
00798 {
00799    float temperature;
00800    unsigned char i;
00801 
00802    REF0CN = 0x0E; // temperature sensor on
00803    AD0EN = 1;     // turn on ADC
00804 
00805    /* set MUX */
00806    AMX0P = 0x1E; // Temp sensor
00807    AMX0N = 0x1F; // GND
00808 
00809    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00810 
00811    AD0INT = 0;
00812    AD0BUSY = 1;
00813    while (AD0INT == 0);
00814 
00815    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00816 
00817    temperature = ADC0L + (ADC0H & 0x03) * 256;
00818 
00819    /* convert to mV */
00820    temperature = temperature / 1023.0 * 3000;
00821 
00822    /* convert to deg. C */
00823    temperature = (temperature - 897) / 3.35;
00824 
00825    /* offset correction using prototype */
00826    temperature -= 27;
00827 
00828    /* strip fractional part */
00829    temperature = (int) (temperature + 0.5);
00830    
00831    for (i=0 ; i<N_HV_CHN ; i++) {
00832       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00833       user_data[i].temperature = temperature;
00834       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00835 
00836       /* read node configuration */
00837       if (JU1 == 0)
00838          user_data[i].status |= STATUS_NEGATIVE;
00839       else
00840          user_data[i].status &= ~STATUS_NEGATIVE;
00841 
00842       if (JU2 == 0)
00843          user_data[i].status |= STATUS_LOWCUR;
00844       else
00845          user_data[i].status &= ~STATUS_LOWCUR;
00846    }
00847 }
00848 
00849 #endif
00850 
00851 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00852 
00853 void user_loop(void)
00854 {
00855    unsigned char channel;
00856 
00857    /* loop over all HV channels */
00858    for (channel=0 ; channel<N_HV_CHN ; channel++) {
00859 
00860       if ((user_data[0].control & CONTROL_IDLE) == 0) {
00861 
00862          /* outcommented until implemented in HW
00863          if (chn_bits[channel] & CUR_LIMIT_CHANGED) {
00864             set_current_limit(user_data[channel].i_limit);
00865             chn_bits[channel] &= ~CUR_LIMIT_CHANGED;
00866          }
00867          */
00868 
00869          /* instead, use software limit */
00870          check_current(channel);
00871    
00872          read_hv(channel);
00873          ramp_hv(channel);
00874          regulation(channel);
00875          read_current(channel);
00876       }
00877    }
00878 
00879    // read_temperature();
00880 }
